line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Issues the plot challenge questions to the player and unlocks the missing gate if successful.
* No Challenge needed if we already finished.

line.text: 'What is the name of the Paranid deity worshipped by their people?'
'What is the traditional Split home sector?'
'What is the name of the Goner ship that can repair other ships?'
'What race values Profits above all else?'
'What race considers itself chosen by the gods?'
'What is the Split family name tied to their leadership?'
'What is the traditional Boron home sector?'
'What is the traditional Paranid home sector?'
'What is the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow (mph)?'

line.comment: * successful, so recreate the missing gate.
* When creating the hidden gate, use sound:
* The Renegades hidden jump gate has been revealed...

line.text: 'Unable to create Renegades gate between %s and %s'
'Challenge Failed. Intruders will not be tollerated.'

line.comment: * not successful, so damage the player hull
* They failed to answer properly, so spawn some trouble.
* Get number of pirates/enemies already in the system and create up to X total by adding Pirates
* display subtitle text: text=$t duration=5000 ms

sval.val: Pilot Compliance Directive: Enter Challenge Code
What is the name of the Paranid deity worshipped by their people?
What race calls the Terrans “Earthlings”?
What is the traditional Split home sector?
Family Pride
Who built the original jumpgate network?
What is the name of the Goner ship that can repair other ships?
Truelight Seeker
What race values Profits above all else?
What race created the Xenon?
What race considers itself chosen by the gods?
What is the Split family name tied to their leadership?
Family Rhonkar
What is the traditional Boron home sector?
Kingdom End
What faction is dedicated to enlightenment?
What is the traditional Paranid home sector?
Paranid Prime
What is the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow (mph)?
A new jump gate has appeared !
Unable to create Renegades gate between %s and %s
Challenge Failed. Intruders will not be tollerated.
SCRIPT NAME: Renegades.Plot.Challenge
DESCRIPTION: Issues the plot challenge questions to the player and unlocks the missing gate if successful.
AUTHOR: Mr Mordan
DATE: 5 April 2024
No Challenge needed if we already finished.
player turned off the feature
successful, so recreate the missing gate.
When creating the hidden gate, use sound:
"Energy Spike Detected"
Create it.

not successful, so damage the player hull
